divs: Sighting Detailsi was in my backyard facing west my friend noticed it and shouted look so i did and i was kinda freaked out before this i never seen anything capable of such speeds an silence at the same time it was extraordinary to say the least. it headed from north north west to south east towards San Diego straight across the sky no flashing no sound an really really fast and it was low it was around id say 50000 feet the only reason we saw it was because some stars flashed and caught are attention that's when we noticed it was moving across the sky
trends: There have been 38 other sightings in Riverside
There was one other sighting in Riverside on or around April 20th 2011
Summary: headed from north north west to south east towards san diego across sky no flashing no sound an really really fast
